Package com.stormpath.sdk.servlet.mvc

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Controller
    Simple MVC Controller concept used by Stormpath components.
    ErrorModelFactory  
    FormFieldParser
    A form field parser can read a text string definition of what form fields should exist and return a list of fields that reflects that string definition.
    ViewModel
    A ViewModel represents a particular view that should be rendered as well as the data model that will be used (if any) when rendering the view.
